content: Stream created by Praveen Shivaprasad.

Can anyone guide me to resources where I might find information of data mapping from ANSI X12 to FHIR resources. Also if you know an open source script library which performs the conversion, I will appreciate the same
You are better off asking that in #financial rather than creating a new stream
Thanks David, I posted my question in the financial stream as recommended
FFR (For Future Reference), direct link EDI X12 question re-posted in #financial: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/208600-financial/topic/EDI.20X12
